title: JST, 2 Thessalonians 2
content: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work,
and he it is who now worketh, and Christ suffereth him to work,
be taken out of the way.
be revealed, whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth, and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming.
there cometh a falling away, by
the working of Satan with all power, and signs and lying wonders,
